mapper.select: SELECT goods_name goodsName, isbn, goods_describe goodsDescribe, goods_price goodsPrice, goods_evaluate_score goodsEvaluateScore, goods_image_path goodsImagePath, goods_author goodsAuthor, goods_press goodsPress FROM t_info_goods WHERE goods_id = #{goodsId}

SELECT b.user_acct userAcct, a.evaluate_id evaluateId, a.evaluate_content evaluateContent, a.evaluate_score evaluateScore, a.create_time createTime FROM t_info_goods_evaluate a LEFT JOIN t_sys_user b ON b.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND b.is_delete = 0 AND a.goods_id = #{goodsId}
AND a.evaluate_score BETWEEN 0 AND 1
AND a.evaluate_score BETWEEN 2 AND 3
AND a.evaluate_score BETWEEN 4 AND 5
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.evaluate_id evaluateId, c.image_path imagePath FROM t_info_goods_evaluate a LEFT JOIN t_info_evaluate_image c ON c.evaluate_id = a.evaluate_id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND a.evaluate_id IN
#{item}
AND a.evaluate_score BETWEEN 0 AND 1
AND a.evaluate_score BETWEEN 2 AND 3
AND a.evaluate_score BETWEEN 4 AND 5
ORDER BY c.image_num
SELECT classify_id classifyId, classify_name classifyName FROM t_info_goods_classify WHERE is_delete = 0 AND classify_parent = '0'

SELECT a.classify_id classifyId, a.classify_name classifyName, b.goods_id goodsId, b.goods_name goodsName, b.goods_image_path goodsImagePath, b.goods_price goodsPrice FROM t_info_goods_classify a LEFT JOIN t_info_goods b ON b.is_delete = 0 AND a.classify_id = b.two_classify_id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND a.classify_parent = #{classifyId}
